title: "Wannabee Hasbeens" Arial-like distressed sans
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080414234136im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/black%20on%20top_4712.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Trivial Pursuit logo script - custom {Mike Y}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080414234136/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42597 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) "There Will Be Blood" distressed blackletter - Kraut-type-a-fuck {Andrew J Sipe} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080414234136/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42493 "Go to next forum topic")
author: awesomecoolderek

comments.content:
Hi Derek,

you already have given a perfect description yourself: It’s a distressed sans, probably based on Arial Black. If you take a close look at the duplicate characters (‘E’, ‘A’, ‘N’, ‘B’, ‘S’), you’ll see that they’re not identical. Thus, it’s likely not a font.

F
The description is mine, Florian. It originally said something like “Please help me identify this font”. :^D ;^)
Ah, okay. Would have surprised me anyway … ;°)
